Eligiblity: Minimum requirement to apply for any M A course is a UGC recognized degree. Application forms can be collected/ submitted online or by post or directly in person. Eligible applicants are required to take an hour long entrance test. Examinations are held on the dates and locations announced in advance. An applicant can apply for a maximum of three courses, and appear for separate tests for each subject.A minimum of 40% marks in the entrance test is the requirement. Marks obtained in the degree examination and in the entrance test will be cumulated on a 50:50 basis and rank list prepared and published accordingly. This rank list will form the basis for admission to the courses. The policies of the government for reservation of seats, and for fee relaxations will be strictly followed while admitting students to the various courses. Maximum age limit is 28 years (while joining the courses). For schedule caste and scheduled tribe applicants, the age limit is 30 years. First Semester starts in August and ends in December, and Second semester starts in January and ends in July. Summer holidays are in April and May.
